name: Wonderwood Saloon
description:
After bellying through the brush, ducking and dodging the law you encounter the oddest of residents at the local watering hole of Wonderwood, a curious little town located amongst the wilds of Texas.   Liquored up without a care in the world you proceed to do what an outlaw does best...skin your iron and shoot the place up without rhyme or reason!

This game was developed playing off of the  old  western shooting galleries that can still be found in arcades and carnivals.  Nice visuals and special effects including: bone jarring explosions, camera shake, smoke, and atmospheric fog.  Quirky character animations.

Powered by Unreal Engine 4.

This game is a very basic, casual, short and simple test run to get familiar with the engine.  Bigger and better things to come!
